meanings.definition: Situated at or forming the end or extremity of something.
meanings.sent1: The train arrived at the terminal station.
meanings.sent2: The last page of the book is the terminal page.
meanings.sent3: The terminal point of the race was marked by a giant balloon.
meanings.sent4: The terminal part of the journey felt like reaching the edge of the world.
meanings.sent5: The terminal cliff overlooked the vast ocean below.

meanings.definition: A device at which a user can interact with a computer system.
meanings.sent1: The airport had several computer terminals for check-in.
meanings.sent2: She typed her report on the computer terminal.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat on the warm computer terminal, enjoying the heat.
meanings.sent4: The terminal hum of the computer filled the room with a comforting sound.
meanings.sent5: The computer terminal displayed the weather forecast for the week.
